Conversation: Good evening so you're the brave soul who opened a new bar?
Well welcome to the town. I rarely see people moving into this city.
I don't think we've been properly introduced. I'm Walter.
I'm delighted to meet you mr. bartender.
Good day to you, and until we meet again.
Good evening again! I hope you're having a pleasant night so far.
I must apologize if I seem a bit stiff tonight -
pent the better part of the day at the hospital having my back examined.
The joys of growing older, as they say!
I've been thinking lately about how quickly time passes.
Seems like just yesterday I was your age, and now here I am.
An old man sharing stories with a fine young bartender.
You've been absolutely wonderful company tonight, my dear fellow
Well, I shall see you next time.
I really appreciate it thank you.
It's not exactly my order but i appreciate it.
